description: Working on EXODUS (exodusgame.com): Designing, engineering, and maintaining a variety of audio systems, including but not limited to Low-Level Game Audio Systems, Multithreaded Callback System and Game State Collectors. In addition, I have designed a bespoke integration of Wwise with the Unreal Sequencer blurring the lines between event based and real time audio for easy and intuitive sequencer editing. Other tools include Spline Audio, Foot-Fall System and Scripting technologies
